contact-us.title: (FR) Contact us
contact-us.description: (FR) There are many ways to reach us about your public pensions.

request-call.title: (FR) Request a call
request-call.description: (FR) Ask us to call you by using eServiceCanada

call-us.title: (FR) Call us
call-us.description: (FR) You can reach us at the following numbers:
call-us.toll-free-description: (FR) The hours of operation are 8:30 am to 4:30 pm local time, Monday to Friday.
call-us.outside-description: (FR) The hours of operation are 8:30 am to 4:30 pm Eastern time, Monday to Friday.
call-us.toll-free: (FR) Canada and the United States toll-free:
call-us.tty: (FR) Canada and the United States TTY:
call-us.outside: (FR) Outside Canada and the United States:

find-office.title: (FR) Find an office
find-office.link-text: (FR) Find a Service Canada office near you

banner.title: (FR) Learn and plan for your retirement
banner.text: (FR) It's never too early or too late to learn about your retirement options and plan for your future. Find out about public pensions, when to take them and tips to consider for your retirement income.

tabs.title: Learn (FR)
tabs.heading: Get the most out of your retirement benefits in Canada (FR)

description.text: There are many factors to consider before you retire. (FR)
Learn about the basics of Canada's old age benefits and ways to manage your money in retirement. (FR)

links.title: Main sources of retirement income (FR)
links.description: Learn about old age benefits, private retirement savings, and how they work together (FR)

links.title: Planning to save for retirement (FR)
links.description: Explore how to maximize your savings and better manage your money in retirement. (FR)

links.title: When to take your public pensions (FR)
links.description: You can choose when to start your old age benefits. Understand what to consider in making that decision (FR)

tabs.title: Plan (FR)
tabs.heading: Not sure where to begin? Take the quiz! (FR)

description.text: Receive a personalized checklist to guide you through retirement. (FR)

links.title: Canadian Retirement Income Calculator (FR)
links.description: Get an estimate of your retirement income. This includes your federal old age benefits and private retirement income. (FR)

links.title: Old Age Security eligibility estimator (FR)
links.description: Find old how much money you may get from the Old Age Security program and its benefits. (FR)

tabs.title: Apply (FR)
tabs.heading: Ready to Apply of CPP and OAS? Get started now (FR)

description.text: To apply online you can sign in or register for a My Service Canada Account (MSCA). To apply in-person or by mail, you can complete a paper application. (FR)

links.title: Canada Pension Plan: How to Apply (FR)
Old Age Security: How to Apply (FR)

tabs.title: Manage (FR)
tabs.heading: Take control of your federal old age benefits with the "My Service Canada" Account (MSCA) (FR)

description.text: You can do a lot with your MSCA, including: (FR)
list: Create and submit your Canada Pension Plan and Old Age Security application(s). (FR)
Check the status, payment dates and amounts for your federal old age benefits. (FR)
Update your mailing address and banking information. (FR)

family-and-friends.text: FR Learn how you can help your loved ones enter the retirement stage in their life.

organizations.text: FR Learn how best to help and navigate clients as they plan for retirement.
